content.name: fan
content.description: (Applies to physical deployments only.) Information about the fans in the storage system.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the fan instance.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information for the fan, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: vendorPartNumber
attributes.description: Vendor part number for the fan.

attributes.name: vendorSerialNumber
attributes.description: Vendor serial number for the fan.

attributes.name: needsReplacement
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the fan needs replacement. Values are:
  • true - Fan needs replacement.
  • false - Fan does not need replacement.

attributes.name: parentDae
attributes.description: Parent Disk Array Enclosure (DAE) of the fan.

attributes.name: emcSerialNumber
attributes.description: EMC serial number for the fan.

attributes.name: parentDpe
attributes.description: Parent Disk Processor Enclosure (DPE) of the fan.

attributes.name: emcPartNumber
attributes.description: EMC part number for the fan.

attributes.name: slotNumber
attributes.description: Slot where the fan is located in the parent enclosure.

attributes.name: model
attributes.description: Manufacturer's model number for the fan.

attributes.name: parent
attributes.description: Resource type and identifier of the fan's parent enclosure.
